ModMetaData.name: Linux Performance Optimizations
ModMetaData.author: Anten Skrabec
ModMetaData.description:
Linux-specific performance optimizations for RimWorld.
This mod enables Transparent Huge Pages (THP) for the RimWorld process, which can improve memory performance on Linux systems. THP allows the kernel to use larger memory pages (2MB instead of 4KB), reducing TLB misses and improving cache efficiency.
The mod automatically detects your system configuration and enables THP if supported. If your kernel doesn't support THP or it's disabled, the mod will log a warning but won't affect gameplay.
Requires: Linux with CONFIG_TRANSPARENT_HUGEPAGE enabled (standard on modern distributions) Platform: Linux only (gracefully skips on Windows/macOS)
To verify THP is working: cat /proc/$(pgrep RimWorldLinux)/smaps | grep AnonHugePages
Source code: https://github.com/cebarks/rimworld-linux-misc
